arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – The Paris squad: 2 players unavailable
arts.sum: This Tuesday (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET), first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face second-place Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. Here is the squad selected by Parisian coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho. Midfielders – Lee, Mayulu, […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs. Bayern Munich: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The two European giants have yet to drop points in the Champions League this season.

arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and teams news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich put their record-breaking winning start to 2025/26 on the line against UEFA Champions League holders Paris Saint-Germain at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday (kick-off: 9pm CET). Bayern are six-time Champions League/ European Cup winners, most recently winning the competition in 2019/20 after beating PSG in the final.
